name: meta4node
readme: meta4node - executable wireframe server ======================================= A lightweight server for 'meta4' written in NodeJS and ExpressJS. What is 'meta4'? It's a front-end framework for building applications using meta-data to define an application rather than code. We built meta4 to streamline the construction of interactive apps, prototypes & MVPs without (much) coding. We believe that it provides a high level of design-time flexibility with a sane JSON syntax. The result is responsive, maintainable application that can be rapidly constructed & deployed. Meta4's meta-model defines and orchestrates your application models, views, business logic and HTML templates. meta4beta is based on Backbone & Marionette, because they provide a minimally opinated framework that is easy to understand, extend and scale. You can find out more by reading: Introduction. User Experience. Views.
